item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia is freed from Tennessee jail so he can rejoin family in Maryland to await trial
item.description: A jail release order from a Tennessee court requires Kilmar Abrego Garcia to travel directly to Maryland, where heâ€™ll be in home detention with his brother as his custodian.
